>
[Strand Strider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2772) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eight legs serve you well when climbing walls and webs alike. You gain a climb speed of 25 feet in your spider shape.
name: Strand Strider
